title: Sated
description: Electric pulses of pleasure landscaped their bodies when they touched. Staring into each other's eyes they quietly appreciated the flux of emotions activating every synapse. Talia had been waiting her whole life to find the one, while Bodhi always knew she was. Their connection was divined and equally fated with the twists of challenge set to test their devotion to love one another. A warm embrace to them represented an unspoken promise of forever. Within each others hearts they were finally home.Sated is the third book in the romantic trilogy.
author: Truth Devour
